Description:
Detects suspicious DNS queries to external service interaction domains often used for out-of-band interactions after successful RCE

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Matt Kelly (list of domains)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query to External Service Interaction Domains
Query: (query="*.interact.sh*" OR query="*.oast.pro*" OR query="*.oast.live*" OR query="*.oast.site*" OR query="*.oast.online*" OR query="*.oast.fun*" OR query="*.oast.me*" OR query="*.burpcollaborator.net*" OR query="*.oastify.com*" OR query="*.canarytokens.com*" OR query="*.requestbin.net*" OR query="*.dnslog.cn*")
